donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
outputs.output_descr:
The programme focuses on supporting Arab countries in their effort to ensure sustainable social and economic development through a regionally owned reform process that focuses on effective governance and efficient management in the public sector through:  a. Improving management of human resources in the civil service; b. Enhancing integrity, transparency and accountability in the delivery of public services; and c. Strengthening the institutional capacity for effective economic governance and efficient management of public resources.

Six themes have identified to constitute this comprehensive programme: 1. Civil service integrity; 2. E-governance, administrative simplification; 3. Governance of public resources; 4. Public service delivery, public private partnership and regulatory reform; 5. Role of judiciary and legal enforcement; 6. Civil society and media.

project_descr: Programme of Governance in the Arab Region (POGAR)
